front.title: Point-to-point Link Assembly for Simple Multiple Access (PLASMA)

abstract.t: This document describes PLASMA, which enables a simple multicast mechanism and autoconfiguration in an IP subnet consisting of point-to-point links, such as ATM, Frame Relay, SONET/SDH, etc. PLASMA utilizes an L2 label switching mechanism and creates data flow paths in a subnet using the PLASMA protocol. The PLASMA protocol is very simply defined and works effectively within a single IP subnet. PLASMA applications to ATM and PPP are also described.
